tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: The Jonathan Ross Show: Special Guests
programme.desc: The guests featured with Jonathan in this show include Adele, Kevin Hart, Justin Bieber, John Legend, Taylor Swift, Idris Elba, Sir David Attenborough and Danny Dyer.

programme.title: The ReStore - Fresh Cuts 2025
programme.desc: Set in a bustling London sneaker store and workshop under Jordan Taylors leadership, the ReStore is the ultimate trainer restoration experience where every pair tells a story.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathans Parents Evening
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts the celebrity game show as Adrian Dunbar, Jo Brand, and Layton Williams face off in another fun family showdown.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern welcomes Aysha as she gets ready to take on the Banker and tries to beat him at his own game.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Shes opened up about her anxiety to her campmates, but how will Shona McGarty get on in the jungle? Her mum and sister join Lorraine to let us know what we can expect.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.title: Loose Men
programme.desc: Vernon Kay is joined by Joe Swash, Rob Rinder and Jordan Banjo to mark five years of Loose Men and reveal the results of a special survey commissioned by the show.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Crossing words this time are twins Ann and Al from Birmingham, friends James and Holly from Surrey, and mother and daughter-in-law Tracy and Georgina from Manchester.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Jenna joins Stephen Mulhern and hopes to be the one to go all the way to win a life-changing 100,000 pounds - all she needs to do to do that is beat the Banker.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Cathy from St Helens, Gerry originally from East Kilbride, Rachel from Chingford and James from London work together as a team as they face one of the countrys finest quiz brains.

programme.title: STV News at Six
programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Liam and Chas keep secrets, Kev holds a handgun close, and Lewis stays upbeat.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Theo forces Todd to entertain Pete at the flat, Carl reassures Abi of his commitment, Nina challenges Roys behaviour, Daniel offers to help Megan, and David blurts a secret.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: The celebrities battle it out to win stars for food in the hope of keeping spirits high in the camp.

programme.desc: As shoplifting rates hit the highest ever recorded in the UK, Paul Brand speaks to those affected and investigates what is being done to tackle the problem.
